meanings.definition: To include or contain as part of a whole.
meanings.sent1: The recipe incorporates various spices to enhance the flavor.
meanings.sent2: She incorporates feedback from her team to improve the project.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle incorporates a surprise twist at the end.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork incorporates elements of nature to create a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The new design incorporates modern technology seamlessly.

meanings.sent1: The business owner incorporates their company for legal protection.
meanings.sent2: They decide to incorporate their small business to expand operations.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends jokingly incorporates their weekly hangouts into a formal corporation.
meanings.sent4: The team incorporates their skills and resources to build a successful corporation.
meanings.sent5: In order to grow, the company decides to incorporate and become more official.
